Build I20040617-0800
Make a new plugin project.  
In manifest editor, go to Extensions Section.  
Click "Add", go to templates, click on "hello world" template.

So far so good.

Double click on any template and get an NPE:

Created an attachment (id=12424)
Patch for PDE UI

Upon investigation, it appears the problem is that we're not calling
wizard.init() on the double click.

Also added titles to the wizard pages.

This is a simple, low-risk, 2-line patch to ensure seamless creation of
template extensions.

The patch looks and works great.

+1 for RC3.

Dejan?
